name: Clunky Ball
description:
Clunky Ball is a Monkey Ball clone that let’s you bonk every which way but Sunday (and sometimes even on Sunday if you eat your peas and go to bed without complaining)! Travel through each obstacle course and find the goal before the time runs out. See your scores at the end for dat speedrunning potential!

Controls
IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO USE A GAMEPAD!!!

Gamepad
Move: Left stick
Menu: D-pad
Pause: Start
Fast Reset: X
Confirm: A
Keyboard
Move: WASD / Arrows
Menu: WASD / Arrows
Pause: Escape
Fast Reset: R
Confirm: Enter

System Requirements

GPU: OpenGL 3.3 (tested with Intel HD 620, Nvidia GTX 970. Any Nvidia or AMD since about 2008 should be fine, probably. Make your window small on Intel.

CPU : Any old i3 or better should be fine. Tested on i5 7200U, i7 2600k.

Display: 800x600 or higher.
